item.description:
Join us as we continue our tour of North End restaurants: this time we will be returning to one of our favorites- Piccolo Nido Restaurant.  After dinner, we will be head to the Living Room for drinks. Each member pays for their own food/drink. We look forward to seeing you for a fun night!

 

RSVP Note. Please only sign up if you can definitely attend as this will be a popular event. Please do not sign up just to hold your spot without knowing if you can definitely attend. If your plans change, please be sure to update your RSVP as soon as possible. Please do NOT wait until the event day to cancel your RSVP.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine (see photo) inside entrance or at our table. If you have trouble finding us, please call 774 232 0000.
item.name: North End Dinner & Drinks: Piccolo Nido Restaurant
